video.title: STUDY FINDS PHYSICAL ACTIVITY MAY HELP IMPROVE COGNITIVE FUNCTION
video.description: With so many people living longer these days, it is estimated that the number of older adults living with Alzheimer’s disease worldwide will increase from about twenty-six million today to about one hundred and six million by the year 2050.  Researchers are looking for ways to help delay the onset of dementia.  A new study finds increasing physical activity may make a difference.
